attributes.action: Let get Driving Instructors some power to assess and then fine offender drivers.
attributes.additional_details: Our roads have to be safer. Drivers seemingly do not respect each other. Even driving instructors and Police Officers are being disregarded in traffic. Driving Instructors extensively know how to drive, therefore they are able to recognise driving offenders.
attributes.background: The number of cases have been significantly increased when drivers are not following rules and the law, therefore thousands and thousands driving instructors would be a great help to report these drivers all around the UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what new powers you'd like the Government or Parliament to give to driving instructors.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
